description.en: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ar: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.br: Reembolsa TODOS os pontos que foram anteriormente adicionados em VIG para que possam ser utilizados novamente. Aplica-se apenas à sua página de atributos atual.
description.cns: 体质属性点初始化，仅对当前属性页有效。
description.de: Setzt deine STA-Stats zurück. Gilt nur für deine aktuelle Stat Seite.
description.fi: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fil: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.fr: Parchemin permettant de redistribuer une fois les points mis dans la statistique d'endurance (END) sur la page actuelle.
description.id: Mereset statistik STA anda. Hanya berlaku untuk halaman stat anda saat ini.
description.it: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.jp: 体力を初期化します。現在のステータスページにのみ適用
description.kr: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.nl: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.pl: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.ru: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.sp: Resetea tus estadísticas de STA. Solo se aplica a sus estadísticas actuales.
description.sw: Resets your STA stats. Only applies to your current stat page.
description.th: รีเซ็ต STA ของคุณ มีผลกับหน้า Stat ปัจจุบันเท่านั้น
description.tw: 重置您的體力數值。 僅適用於您當前的統計頁面。
description.vi: Đặt lại STA stats. Chỉ áp dụng cho trang stat hiện tại của bạn.
